definition: preliminary contest/initial heats of a competition
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: All competition details of the preliminary and final will be informed by post.
sentences.chinese: 有关初赛及决赛之资料及结果将以邮寄方式通知。

sentences.english: Top 8 of the preliminary will fight for the bonus on Apr.14 and 15 in Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 初赛八强将于4月14日和15日在首尔进行决赛。

sentences.english: Groupings in the preliminary round will be determined by the organizer.
sentences.chinese: 初赛分组由大会抽签决定。

sentences.english: However, the boy was eliminated in an early round.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是小宝初赛时就被淘汰了。

sentences.english: All participants will receive Prize & Certificate in the Preliminary.
sentences.chinese: 所有参赛同学将在初赛统一颁发奖品和证书。

definition: (sports) semifinal or quarterfinal/to compete in a semifinal (or a quarterfinal)
direct, winner-takes-all system of election in use for village committees/preselection for a competition
single-elimination open tournament (the winner stays on until he is himself defeated)
to compete/to take part in a competition
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
evaluation committee/judging panel/judging panel member/adjudicator/abbr. for 評選委員會委員|评选委员会委员[ping2 xuan3 wei3 yuan2 hui4 wei3 yuan2]
